title: Cat and Rat Ranch Hoax
subtitle: We feed the cats to the rats, the rats to the cats, and get the skins for free!
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: A serious prospectus inviting investors to become part of a cat-and-rat farm was once circulated, the basic premise of which involved skinning cats for their fur, feeding the cat carcasses to rats, then feeding the rats to the cats being raised for their fur.
